features.name: WiFi connection
features.description: Connects to WiFi using STA_IF, syncs time via NTP on connect.

features.name: Ultrasonic distance sensor
features.description: Reads distance in cm from HC-SR04 on TRIG=GP3, ECHO=GP2 (get_distance).

features.name: Relay control
features.description: Controls heating relay on GPIO 15 (active-low: LOW=ON, HIGH=OFF).

features.name: Firebase status and history
features.description: Updates Firebase system state (current_status, current_level, last_update) and appends to history log (update_firebase).

features.name: Firebase connection test
features.description: Writes a test payload to Firebase at startup to verify connectivity (test_firebase_connection).

features.name: Command polling
features.description: Polls Firebase command.json for system_cmd (ON/OFF) and manual_update; deduplicates and drives relay + update_firebase.

features.name: Periodic update
features.description: When relay is ON, sends periodic Firebase update every 30 minutes (configurable).

features.name: Timestamp utility
features.description: Formats local time as YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS (get_timestamp).
